subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Billy Wagner allowed a tie-breaking solo home run to So Taguchi leading off the ninth inning to boost the St. Louis Cardinals to a victory over the Mets in Game 2 of the N.L.C.S.
snippet: Billy Wagner allowed a tie-breaking solo home run to So Taguchi leading off the ninth inning to boost the St. Louis Cardinals to a victory over the Mets in Game 2 of the N.L.C.S.
